mapper.select: SELECT id,activityId,lotteryId,createTime,lotteryName,isluck,state,userId,upoint,ip,remake,addressId ,(select c.val1 from uc_lottery_activityprize c where c.lotteryId=z.lotteryId) as lotteryLevel ,(select d.send from uc_lottery d where d.id=z.lotteryId) as lotterySend ,(select a.username from uc_user a where a.id=z.userId) as userName ,(select b.name from uc_lottery_activity b where b.id=z.activityId) as activityName from uc_lottery_log z where id=#{id}
